examples: he bought it on an impulse

definitions.text: the electrical discharge that travels along a nerve fiber
examples: they demonstrated the transmission of impulses from the cortex to the hypothalamus

definitions.text: (electronics) a sharp transient wave in the normal electrical state (or a series of such transients)
examples: the pulsations seemed to be coming from a star

definitions.text: the act of applying force suddenly

examples: the car's momentum carried it off the road
